actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1758.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11153 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, restore, operate, and maintain new or modified features at existing Federal reclamation dams for safety of dams purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11153 (Safety of Federal reclamation dams).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11153 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, restore, operate, and maintain new or modified features at existing Federal reclamation dams for safety of dams purposes.
